name: Request partially successful
title_long: The request has been partially successful (some information was provided, but not all)

name: Request refused
title_long: The Public Body refuses to provide the information.

name: Request was withdrawn
title_long: User withdrew the request for other reasons.

name: Request was withdrawn due to costs
title_long: User withdrew the request due to the associated costs.

name: Information not held
title_long: The Public Body stated that it does not possess the information.

name: Fee charged
title_long: This request is connected with a fee.

name: Response overdue
title_long: The request has not been answered in time.

name: Fee charged
title_long: This request is connected with a fee.

name: Response overdue
title_long: The request has not been answered in time.
